about.title: About
about.text:
Fullstack Engineer and Software Architect with over 10 years of experience in enterprise SaaS systems.

Focused on scaling platforms and modernizing legacy architectures. Designing modular, maintainable systems built to manage complexity at scale.

Clean architecture and pragmatic engineering guide every technical decision.

frontend.title: Frontend Architecture
frontend.description: Designing scalable component ecosystems and modular frontend structures for enterprise applications.

backend.title: Backend Systems
backend.description: Building REST-based services and modular backend architectures using ASP.NET Core and C#.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce & Platforms
ecommerce.description: Architecting and scaling transactional platforms with high availability requirements.

devops.title: DevOps & CI/CD
devops.description: Designing automated build and deployment pipelines to improve release reliability and operational stability.

solendroPlatform.title: Solendro Platform Evolution
solendroPlatform.tech: Nuxt.js · LoopBack · Magento · AWS OpsWorks · Laravel
solendroPlatform.summary1: Led the architectural evolution of an international e-commerce platform, transitioning from a legacy Magento system to a modern API-driven architecture.
solendroPlatform.summary2: Improved modularity, deployment workflows, and long-term maintainability.
solendroPlatform.impact: Modernized platform architecture and supported international expansion.

dataAnalytics.title: Data & Analytics Platform
dataAnalytics.summary1: Designed an internal analytics system to centralize operational and business reporting.
dataAnalytics.summary2: Implemented dashboards and data aggregation pipelines to improve visibility across workflows.
dataAnalytics.impact: Strengthened data-driven decision-making through centralized insights.

enterpriseCrm.title: Enterprise CRM Modernization
enterpriseCrm.tech: Vue 3 · TypeScript · ASP.NET Core · REST APIs
enterpriseCrm.summary1: Contributing to the modernization of a multi-tenant enterprise CRM platform by refactoring legacy components and improving architectural boundaries.
enterpriseCrm.summary2: Strengthened integration patterns between frontend and backend services.

microFrontends.title: Micro Frontend Architecture Design
microFrontends.summary1: Designed modular frontend architecture to support scalable development across teams.
microFrontends.summary2: Established shared UI foundations and clear domain boundaries to reduce coupling.
microFrontends.impact: Improved frontend scalability and cross-team efficiency.
